# Overview
This module provides a brief introduction to AI and why and how to use AI tools.


# Learning Objectives

* Know some basic concepts of AI.
* Know why to use AI tools.
* Understand risks and limitations of AI tools.
* Know how to use some common AI tools.
* Be familiar with ways to use AI for data analysis tasks.
* Be aware of ways to use AI with R.


# Content

The module consists of the following units:

* [Introduction to AI](./ai-introduction/ai-introduction.qmd)

* [Introduction to LLM AI tools](./ai-llm-introduction/ai-llm-introduction.qmd)

* [A conceptual framework for LLM AI tools](./ai-conceptual/ai-conceptual.qmd)

* [Recommended AI tools](./ai-tools/ai-tools.qmd)

* [Using AI to write code](./ai-write-code-r/ai-write-code-r.qmd)

* [Using AI to fix code](./ai-fix-code-r/ai-fix-code-r.qmd)

* [Using AI to explore data](./ai-eda-r/ai-eda-r.qmd)

* [Using AI to analyze data](./ai-analysis-r/ai-analysis-r.qmd)

* [Links to AI resources](./ai-resources/ai-resources.qmd)
